last_episode_to_air.name: Todos Somos Cuervos
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the finals arrive, the Cuervos and Nuevo Toledo are on the brink of ruin. Chava and Isabel must pull off their greatest scheme yet to save them.

name: Club de Cuervos
overview: When the patriarch of a prominent family dies, his heirs battle to determine who will gain control of his beloved soccer team: The Cuervos of Nuevo Toledo.

episodes.name: Be a Captain
episodes.overview: When family tragedy strikes, playboy Chava and his workaholic sister Isabel fight over the presidency of their family's professional soccer team.

episodes.name: We Make Soap
episodes.overview: While Isabel explores life away from the Cuervos, Chava and Felix scramble to prevent a public relations disaster.

episodes.name: Uniform Response
episodes.overview: As Chava tries to make his mark on the team, Isabel looks into Mary Luz's past, and Tony tries to convince Coach Goyo to let him debut.

episodes.name: Slap
episodes.overview: Chava battles with Coach Goyo. Meanwhile, Isabel struggles to do business with a sexist sponsor.

episodes.name: Barriers to Exit
episodes.overview: Felix considers an offer from a rival team, Chava tries to impress a cute reporter, and Isabel makes a new friend.

episodes.name: Lucky to Play
episodes.overview: While the players anxiously prepare for the most important game of the season, Rafael reflects on his upcoming retirement.

episodes.name: Our Guggenheim
episodes.overview: Felix carefully maps out his plans for the team's lineup next season, but Chava has ideas of his own.

episodes.name: Aitor
episodes.overview: A documentary profile offers a behind-the-scenes look at European superstar Aitor Cardone's arrival to the Cuervos.

episodes.name: Spanish Fever
episodes.overview: As Chava rides the wave of Aitor's fame, Moises begins feeling insecure about his place on the team. Isabel deals with the fallout from her interview.

episodes.name: New Dick in Town
episodes.overview: Aitor's presence upsets the balance of the team, Isabel struggles with being ostracized, and Potro's jealousy continues to create problems.

episodes.name: Push
episodes.overview: Felix is left to manage the team on his own while a new arrival keeps Chava busy.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday Mr. President
episodes.overview: Chava has the worst birthday ever as scandal engulfs Aitor and Isabel seizes an opportunity.

episodes.name: Iglesias vs. Iglesias
episodes.overview: Chava and Isabel's rivalry comes to a head as the team faces its greatest challenge and Mary Luz asserts herself.

episodes.name: Descenso
episodes.overview: Chava's family worries about where he could be, while Isabel faces unexpected challenges with the team's division status.

episodes.name: Welcome to Second
episodes.overview: When cash flow problems plague the Cuervos, the players revolt. Isabel makes a serious personal decision. Hugo Sanchez searches for Chava.

episodes.name: Who Are You Looking For?
episodes.overview: Chava locks himself in Aitor's apartment for 70 days. When he finally emerges, a drug-fueled revelation has him questioning his entire identity.

episodes.name: Ho Oponopono
episodes.overview: Chava returns and is focused on reconciliation. Isabel is skeptical but must focus on a lawsuit, unmotivated players and emotional struggles.

episodes.name: Matahari
episodes.overview: A traitor works to undermine the Cuervos in the playoffs. Rafael and Isabel’s professional arguments impact their marriage.

episodes.name: The Oasis in the Desert
episodes.overview: A new coach shakes things up for the team. Isabel confronts Chava, who retaliates by calling immigration services on Potro.

episodes.name: La Salvadora
episodes.overview: Isabel gains fans of her own as Cuervos continues to win. A jealous Chava throws himself into developing a casino deal.

episodes.name: The Truce
episodes.overview: Mary Luz and Chava try to convince the wild and wealthy Ricky Lamas to invest in their casino. Mary Luz encounters someone from her past.

episodes.name: The Curse of the Black Feather
episodes.overview: Isabel tries to convince her team there is no curse. Chava investigates Mary Luz's history. Potro's fake marriage is not what he expected.

episodes.name: Iglesias vs Iglesias 2
episodes.overview: The Cuervos and Carneros face off in the championship game to see who will ascend to Division 1. Chava makes an unexpected power play.

episodes.name: The Third Generation
episodes.overview: Isabel and Chava adjust to life as co-presidents of the Cuervos team and take on the governor as their first obstacle.

episodes.name: The Treaty of Versailles 14
episodes.overview: When the Cuervos bring a new high-profile teammate on board, Rafa must clean up a mess caused by Chava and Isabel.

episodes.name: The Leftovers
episodes.overview: Isabel's decision puts a strain on the Cuervos team lineup just as the draft begins, and they must scramble to recover.

episodes.name: Business or Pleasure?
episodes.overview: Chava's gubernatorial candidacy hits a snag when old incriminating photos of him surface. Isabel mixes business with pleasure.

episodes.name: The Road Back
episodes.overview: Chava's relationship with Isabel Cantú ends up benefitting the Cuervos financially, while creating a challenge for his sister.

episodes.name: Our Cuau
episodes.overview: The siblings fight over whether to fire Cuau. Chava gets nervous filming his first campaign ad for governor.

episodes.name: Church and State
episodes.overview: Rafa is interviewed about his career. Chava thinks he’s a better political candidate when he improvises -- until an angry moment is caught on TV.

episodes.name: Puebla...
episodes.overview: The team struggles to keep key player Moisés happy after a disappointing commercial. Cuau is offered a chance to enter the political arena.

episodes.name: Girl, Interrupted
episodes.overview: Chava makes a big decision regarding his campaign and personal life. Isabel receives a shocking and revealing email not intended for her.

episodes.name: The Heart of Nuevo Toledo
episodes.overview: A reporter makes a troubling discovery about Don Salvador Iglesias and his past. Isabel and Chava turn to their mothers for clarity on their father.

episodes.name: Diego Villalobos
episodes.overview: Amid hostility from the public about his father, Chava ponders a name change. The Iglesias family debate selling the Cuervos to pay off their debt.

episodes.name: You've Got Email
episodes.overview: When Gaspar steals players from the Cuervos, Isabel seeks help from unlikely sources. Chava's plan to raise money is foiled by a person from his past.

episodes.name: Valle de Silicon
episodes.overview: Potro helps Isabel block Fede's romantic advances. Chava launches Cuervos TV. Emaíl's religion causes conflict with Aitor. Gaspar's sabotage continues.

episodes.name: The Slut of Nuevo Toledo
episodes.overview: Mary Luz enters World Cup negotiations. Chava gets creative when the Cuervos are moved to a 7 a.m. time slot. Isabel and Fede's tryst hits the press.

episodes.name: Cyrano de Bergerac
episodes.overview: Isabel secretly helps Potro improve his coaching. Fed up with all the bad press about the team, Chava decides they should use it to their advantage.

episodes.name: The Black Plague
episodes.overview: Chava urges Isabel to lean in to her "promiscuous" reputation. Emaíl worries he's been found out. The Cuervos get a new coach and face the Tarántulas.

episodes.name: Four Minor Miracles
episodes.overview: When the Iglesias bank accounts are frozen, the players leverage social media to raise money, but their lack of focus affects a qualifying match.

episodes.name: Concentration Camp
episodes.overview: The Cuervos go on a retreat to unplug from social media, but Isabel and Rafa's feud and a confession from Emaíl threaten the team-building dynamic.

episodes.name: Something About Mary Luz
episodes.overview: Paty and Chava produce a documentary that could change the course of fate for the Cuervos. Mary Luz charms Maldonado to help take down Gaspar.

episodes.name: Two for the Road
episodes.overview: Traveling together to the semifinals, Isabel and Rafa are "Two for the Road," reflecting on their first meeting in 2006 and their decade-long marriage.

episodes.name: A Trip to the Moon
episodes.overview: After Chava kidnaps a reporter, his family asks him to do the unthinkable. Gaspar calls the authorities on Mary Luz. The Cuervos play in the semifinals.

episodes.name: Todos Somos Cuervos
episodes.overview: As the finals arrive, the Cuervos and Nuevo Toledo are on the brink of ruin. Chava and Isabel must pull off their greatest scheme yet to save them.
